parameters.content:
###  Bonus (optional)
Connect the `Output (News Summary)` to the node below, add your Google account info, and send the News summary by email.

parameters.text:
=Job Posting Description:  {{ $json.message.content.job_description }}
Candidate's Original Resume: {{ $('Get Original Resume').item.json.content }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a Resume Enhancement Specialist. Your task is to enhance the provided resume based on the job requirements from LinkedIn job postings. INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Take the original resume content and the job posting details 2. Enhance the resume to better match the job requirements 3. Keep all original sections: Summary, Experience, Education, Skills, Projects, Awards & Certifications 4. Improve the content to highlight relevant skills and experiences 5. Maintain the professional structure and formatting 6. Output the COMPLETE enhanced resume with ALL sections IMPORTANT FORMATTING RULES: - Output ONLY clean HTML content, no markdown formatting - Do NOT include ```html or ``` or backticks in your response - Do NOT include the word "html" at the beginning - Use this exact structure:

Shatakshi Singh

Business Data Analyst
Contact:
  • Phone: (484)-645-3662
  • Email: shatakshiadm@gmail.com
  • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/shatakshisingh2000
  • Location: Jersey City, NJ

Summary

[Enhanced summary based on job description — highlight analytical expertise, SQL/Python/BI tools, marketing intelligence experience, and measurable outcomes relevant to the target role]

Experience

Amazon Web Services (AWS) — Business Data Analyst

Seattle, WA | Mar 2024 – Present

  • Architected a self-service Marketing Intelligence Portal by conducting 25+ stakeholder interviews and integrating QuickSight and SQL, reducing data access time by 40% and scaling reporting for 3.5K users to enable faster marketing and executive insights.
  • Standardized 50+ dashboards and KPIs by mapping pain points and creating intuitive workflows using Power BI and ETL pipelines, improving user satisfaction by 30% and eliminating redundant reporting.
  • Accelerated delivery through persona-based UX research, Figma prototyping, and Asana tracking, finalizing wireframes 3 months early and expanding stakeholder engagement by 25%.

CWAVE Solutions — Data Analyst Intern

Exton, PA | May 2024 – Aug 2024

  • Developed Power BI dashboards with automated refreshes to track cybersecurity incidents and SLA adherence, reducing manual reporting by 30% and improving executive response time.
  • Engineered Databricks ETL pipelines with Delta Lake and PySpark to unify SIEM log data from 5 sources, boosting reporting speed by 40% and improving data accuracy.
  • Analyzed 100K+ access logs using SQL window functions and anomaly detection, defining KPIs and source-to-target mappings that strengthened audit readiness for threat classification.

Pennsylvania State University — Research Data Analyst

Malvern, PA | Sep 2023 – Dec 2024

  • Evaluated aircraft engine performance data using Random Forest, XGBoost, and statistical validation to identify maintenance predictors, reducing projected costs by 15%.
  • Built a predictive maintenance ML pipeline leveraging telematics and sensor data, reducing unscheduled downtime by 15%.

LG Electronics — Data Analyst Intern

Noida, India | Jun 2022 – Dec 2022

  • Preprocessed 50K+ customer reviews using Python (pandas, NLTK, SpaCy) for sentiment analysis pipelines supporting e-commerce product feedback.
  • Applied SVM, CNN, and LSTM models to classify sentiment and predict ratings, uncovering behavioral trends that informed UX and product improvements.
  • Delivered insights from predictive NLP workflows contributing to an 18% increase in customer satisfaction for LG’s e-commerce product lines.

Projects

E-commerce Trend Analysis

  • Analyzed 3K+ U.S. transactions with Python EDA to uncover category-wise sales trends and regional growth drivers.
  • Built Tableau dashboards for executive visibility into KPIs like sales and profit margins, enabling faster pricing and fulfillment decisions.

Customer Churn & Retention Dashboard

  • Created Power BI dashboards integrated with SQL and Python to track churn rate and ARPU, reducing manual reporting by 40%.
  • Performed cohort analysis to identify high-risk customer segments, improving retention strategy and lowering projected churn by 18%.

Education

The Pennsylvania State University — Malvern, PA
Master of Data Analytics | Graduation: Dec 2024
Specialization: Big Data Systems | Awarded Warren Musser Fellowship

Skills

  • Programming & Data: Python, R, SQL, PostgreSQL, Java, C/C++, MATLAB
  • Data & BI Tools: Power BI, Tableau, Excel, Databricks, AWS QuickSight, Google BigQuery, Oracle
  • Cloud & Dev Tools: Git, Apache Spark, Data Factory, Jarvis Data Lake, AMPS
  • Analytics & Modeling: Machine Learning, NLP, ETL, Data Modeling, Feature Engineering, Visualization
  • Design & Productivity: UI/UX Design, Figma, Microsoft Office

Awards & Certifications

  • Microsoft Certified: Power BI Data Analyst Associate – Mar 2025
  • Google Cloud – Cloud Digital Leader – Nov 2024
  • Oracle Analytics Cloud Professional – Oct 2025
Start your response directly with

and end with the last job entry. No extra text or formatting markers.
